website_summaries.verdict: Very much an entry-level table for casual play, but still built tough enough for aggressive younger users. Ideal for a home rec room or office break room.
pros: Aesthetically pleasing stadium design and colorful players
Can be assembled in less than an hour
Surprisingly durable for its price point
cons: Sized for younger players, not ideal for adults
Lightweight construction materials create unwanted movement

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids and adults, i added some custome features like led lights and painted my players
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect it to last a lifetime but if kept indoors should serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what I expected for the price. Don’t expect it to last a lifetime but if treated well and kept out of the weather will serve its purpose. Unboxed it after storing it for two years and everything was still undamaged, stickers and parts were in good shape. All the hardware was in the box but was missing the instructions and I was able to find them online through the reviews on Amazon. Did take some time to put together but not anything I didn’t expect. my son and I (12) were able to have it together in a little over two hours .
customer_reviews.author: curtis williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for indoors
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty good deal and its lightweight . Its like made of plastic plus wood. Its great for indoor and for adults. It is pretty decent to play. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be well made, but asembly was easier to assemble the table without the rods, then take the men off and assemble them into the finished table. Cut out all the balancing act of doing it alone trying to hold the rods is and screw the table together. Was able to assemble alone in under three hours. The kids in our youth ministry program are putting in through its paces. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone 5'9'' and under.
customer_reviews.text: We love it, really sturdy, works well and smooth (especially with foos lube). Standard balls do not fit through hole, need to buy smaller size. The player setup is great and better for beginners. Space it occupies is nice. Would buy again-- a really fun starter table to see if people like it, may sell it and upgrade at some point. Great product for price.
customer_reviews.author: Qualified

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this product, there were numerous issues. To begin with, many of the components were severely damaged and made for a very difficult assembly. Furthermore, there were numerous pre-drilled holes on the product that were misaligned which also made the assembly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: tama

customer_reviews.title: Quality and warranty is questionable
customer_reviews.text: We spent a lot of time and effort researching ping pong tables and decided to purchase this one. Initially, it was great. One day while folding the table up, one of the legs fell and broke off. The leg bent and ripped from the wood. This was 3 months after purchase. When we called customer service we were sure they would be able to help. Basically were told there was nothing they could do. We were very disappointed at the companies effort to stand behind their product. The damage was not made during play and was not because of misuse. Be aware that the warranty may not be available as you think.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your Rec Room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother and his buddies who live in a group home for veterans. The fellows enjoy playing this in the canteen. Only downside is that it is not built as sturdy as it might be, but it has withstood regular use by this fine group of disabled vets.
customer_reviews.author: Watchman

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level table for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap table. Will not withstand outdoor weather, but will withstand youngster's playing. If they decide they LOVE foosball, you can buy a nicer table that that point.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Great table! My 8 year old (and 36 yr old) loves it!! We put it together in about 30 minutes. Installation tip: make sure the men are facing the correct way when you put them in. Otherwise you’ll get to the end and flip the table over to realize you have guys facing backwards to the goal.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but need two people for set up
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a terrific product, especially for the price. It was a little off in that the back line includes three players rather than one goalie, but this is for younger children ages 7, 10, and 11 and does not bother them at all. You definitely need two people to set it up, which took about 2 hours. Be absolutely sure the hole and screws line up and that you do not over tighten the screw or it will damage. With pools mostly closed and activities limited, it's the perfect indoor activity and we are super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Music mom

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment for kids and their friends
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their friends play with this thing all the time. We have had hours of fun with it so we have gotten our money’s worth of fun. The only thing I didn’t like and had to fix was the black handles. They kept pulling off the metal. I wrapped some tape around the metal rod and reinserted the handle now it is on there for ever.
customer_reviews.author: George Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Very good table. My son love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good table.My son love it. Giving only 3 stars because one side of the table had a crack and we have to tape it,also missing one screw in the packet (says 6 available but found only 5),luckily we were able to get similar one from our own tool box.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It is a marginally nice foosball table. I suppose you get what you pay for. Assembly was ridiculously difficult for me as a single mother...it’s definitely a two person job. I would spend the extra money and purchase a better quality product next time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Got kids?  Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing deal. It's sturdy and hours of fun. I have 4 boys from 5 to 17 years old. The whole family has enjoyed it and it fits right in our living room!!
customer_reviews.author: E’smom

customer_reviews.title: instructions are hard
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is good - but after we assembled the table we realized the foosball men are not in the in the correct order. This will require us to dissemble the entire table to correct this. ugh! The directions could have been much clearer with a good picture of the opponents so that the assembly could be correct! Not happy !
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to build!
customer_reviews.text: Building it was a nightmare! First, the end piece came broken. I called and they did send a replacement part but then the holes did not line up with the legs. I had to get a drill and make one of the holes larger. There were not enough washers requiring me to go to Lowes to buy some. Probably the most frustrating thing I have ever built and several times I thought of just quitting and throwing it away! I am giving it 2 stars (and not one) because now that it is built, it does look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun !
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed for the price. I needed something for the game room but within budget. This game nailed it. Perfect size, price, and tons of fun for our family. We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for kids & adults alike :)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the kids I nanny for a holiday gift. It is not a super heavy duty, large table, but it serves it’s purpose for a 12, 9 & 5 year old. They really like it a lot! It’s not too small that adults can play also. Good, sturdy table for beginners :)
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: We are very satisfied with the table
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with the table. Bought as a birthday present for my 10yo. For the price we paid, it was very high quality and it took my husband and I about 45 minutes to assemble. Good sturdy table.
customer_reviews.author: Watergirl

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for (barely)
customer_reviews.text: An OK table for the price ($109). The kids love it, which is what matters most. It took me less than an hour to put together, but I couldn't add one screw (piece missing to keep it in place-see picture). One of the plastic goal-keeping score board (see picture) was held together by rubber bands. Seems like poor quality control by Hathaway.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Balls are too small for players to hit. very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It took us 3 hours to assemble this table. There was an error in the instructions and it was extremely difficult to assemble. Two of the team rods are stiff and so do not move easily. There are times when the ball cannot be touched by the players due to the spacing. If it wasn’t so hard to assemble I would return it. The balls are too small so difficult for players to hit.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Only three of 4 leg bolts would line up with pre installed nut plates on two ends. Didn't send back because it was a late present for grandkids and they were ready to play. Certainly wouldn't recommend on quality when hardware doesn't work completely. Rod bushings around player rods keep popping out of side sockets too.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Good and loved
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas gift for my nephew and nieces ages 8, 11 and 12. They love it more than the Xbox they got! Looks good and was honestly pretty easy to set up. Took maybe an hour and a half to put together with another person. I’d recommend a power drill.
customer_reviews.author: Adam1000

customer_reviews.title: For the price is okay, but has imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: Is an "okay" toy for the price and can't complain there and it is fairly nicely built. My ONLY problem is the design of the goali hole. Almost every single time the ball goes into the goali the ball flies out of the goali compartment and falls on the ground. That is really annoying. That's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mister M

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Good quality. The table has been played with constantly since Christmas 2015 and still is in great shape. My thirteen year old son and his friend play with it all the time. I'm very happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: jason costa

customer_reviews.title: THE REGENT-HALEX REPLACEMENT FOOSBALLS DO NOT FIT THE HOLES FOR THIS TABLE.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good starter `table. It was kind of tough to put together with one person but doable. But be warned: THE REGENT-HALEX REPLACEMENT FOOSBALLS (Pack of 4), Black/White, Small DO NOT FIT THE HOLES FOR THIS TABLE.
customer_reviews.author: LSM

customer_reviews.title: Great foosball table for the money
customer_reviews.text: bought for kids for Christmas. Arrived faster than expected. instructions are pretty straightforward except it doesn't remind you to position the players in a certain direction which I learned the hard way. Easy to assemble. Took me less than 1 hour to assemble and did need someone to help me flip over. Kids so far have loved playing it.
customer_reviews.author: cutiger1996

customer_reviews.title: We love this game
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game! For the price it provides great entertainment and quality is good. They should make the player colors more opposite as blue and green are close! Also we have it in wood floor so it slides a bit as it is not heavy. On a carpet it would be good or a floor rug under. My boys really love it. It's great fun for the family. Overall great value.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and boys and they love it!! We use it everyday. I'm just hoping that it stays level. It seems pretty sturdy for a 12 yr old and an 8 year old slamming it around so far. I'll update if not
customer_reviews.author: Christianchic

customer_reviews.title: kid size not for adults
customer_reviews.text: This foose ball table is actually kid size too small for adults to play with. It is also light weight so when you play with it moves alot. The parts were cheap most of the material was made of plywood. The rubber handle grips kept slipping off the handle bars. If your going to buy a Foose ball table save up and buy one made from solid wood heavy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo valdez

customer_reviews.title: Carefully read directions
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son’s 8th bday. He was super excited and we have so much fun playing. Perfect height for him but also works for adults as well. Easy to put together as long as you carefully follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Finley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Table
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Tried putting it together and pieces did not line up correctly. Screw for one end of the table 'popped' off . Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: teachcsg

customer_reviews.title: Solid Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, sturdy, great fun for everyone! My family goes through spurts of playing with it and not playing with it. But we have it where it can be seen daily so when the urge rises to play, it gets played.
customer_reviews.author: Tephie

customer_reviews.title: A gift that was truly loved.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son’s 25th birthday and he and his roommates love it. It only took them about an hour to assemble. And it was nearly half the price of others and a very sturdy build.
customer_reviews.author: Heisenburger

customer_reviews.title: Fun game at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy using the foosball table at home. I will need to find a way to help it stay still when my guys are playing games. It slides around on the hardwood flooring quite a bit. Other than that, it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for money
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price. Overall the table was easy to put together minus the few pre-drilled holes that weren't properly made which forced me to use extra tools. To help ensure the supports under the playing field stayed secure I use wood glue. I would buy again if needed. Son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: We put this together - about an hour and a half with 2 of us and 0 power tools - and I'm extremely impressed with the ease of assembly. All the holes lined up, all parts accounted for!!! (Small miracle). The quality of the product is perfect for home use, and the price is awesome. I'll update after a few weeks of use, but 10 games in.... so far we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherSP

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for children.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine table for children. It would not hold up to the rigors that adult players would apply to the framework or control rods. Assembly was almost a joy. The all parts except the end panels fit together flawlessly. The grandchildren love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this soccer table
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this soccer table. It's a perfect size that doesn't take up too much space and light enough to move around, if needed. My kids and their friends have a great time playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table for the price! It was easy to assemble in about 45 minutes. Fairly sturdy base yet light weight to move. Decent action and fun! The black plastic handles on the ends of the poles sometimes slide off with vigorous play. They can be given a bit of staying power with some superglue. My kids are very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: J Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good table for the price. My kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: vmandmm

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Him and his friends plays with it all the time. It was a hit on Christmas, even the adults were playing with the foosball!
customer_reviews.author: L.Vaz

customer_reviews.title: Kid-size, NOT adult-size!
customer_reviews.text: We are only giving this table 2 stars because it is a kid-size table - the product description needs to be updated. (It does look like a nice kid-size foosball table.)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out design
customer_reviews.text: Put this together ahead of time, so Christmas day would not be so frantic. Took around 45 minutes to assemble. A power driver will help, but as the manual says only use the low torque setting. Although the wood is mdf, it has plastic inserts that the screws are driven into. This seems to be a better system than just driving screws into the wood. The rods are hollow, but they seem sturdy enough to me. Once assembled it's quite big, getting around doors at top/bottom of stairs is tricky. You might want to leave the legs off until it is in the room you want!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: End panel was defective and it was not apparent until attaching the last leg. The metal insert that Bolt #1 and Washer #2 were to screw into was damaged. Found a work around because I didn't want to dismantle it to return it and have to assemble another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Works great, wasn’t the easiest to build we needed four people otherwise works great
customer_reviews.author: rosie schaible

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid table and perfect addition to our playroom! This has been a big hit for our 5 and 7 year olds....
customer_reviews.author: NCMom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to assemble. Perfect for kids. Adult play is good, but recommend the regulation size for active adult play.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sturdy and fun. Perfect for home use. Maybe not in a bar or dorm common room, but definitely in a home. My husband said it was pretty easy to assemble, too. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Hil

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed came with 2 same side. Son made it work anyway it was a Christmas present.🙁
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ozburn

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun
customer_reviews.text: The directions for assembly suck. Be careful how you place the players on the board. Make sure they are facing the proper direction. The good thing is that my kids love the game.
customer_reviews.author: Edu P.

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for me and my 9 year old to put together, but it is great and we have a lot of fun playing on it. Be careful of the size of balls you buy (if you get extras) as the ones I ordered were too large.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lowman

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when assembling and watch the colors of players to match in right spot. I bit difficult to assemble. Kids enjoy it. Thought was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: Once we got the table put together, all ages in the family enjoyed it. However, it was very difficult to assemble. Some of the holes didn't match up; some of the locations for screws were so small that someone with large hands couldn't fit; and we had to keep flipping it from top to bottom for the next step. But, having said that, our grandson loves it and is enjoying playing with friends and family very much.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are vague. Table is not sturdy. Pre-screwed screws are loose and I have to constantly tighten them between games. On of the men on the table. Not completely disappointed but it did not exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Keon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best deal for a good, solid foosball table out there. Assembly was fairly easy and it's surprisingly sturdy! The best part? My grandchildren love it!
customer_reviews.author: PRD

customer_reviews.title: Recommended product
customer_reviews.text: Very good and high quality product, yet to be teen tested but great fun for grandparents. Instructions could be clearer on determining player layout and how to make them face the correct direction.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M

customer_reviews.title: Fun and works well
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality materials. Fun and works well. fit tolerances not great...made assembly a bit of a challenge...still only a 2 hour project
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. After purchasing a Hathaway air hockey table, I decided to buy a Hathaway foosball table and I am very pleased. Assembly was straight forward and everything went together easily.
customer_reviews.author: vinson19

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the product. Good think in home to spend time away from small screens !!
customer_reviews.author: Arvind Bhandari

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't go any wrong. Good quality, Kids love it. I love it Installation was ok. some holes are not totally aligned
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: My son loved
customer_reviews.text: There was a missing screw on the scoreboard and I had to just glue it. Not sure if missed the Quality Assurance process. Otherwise no other issues. My son loved it
customer_reviews.author: Plymouth mom

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the family!  Easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this foosball table for my 9 year old son's birthday - it's a big hit in our house. Great for kids as the players look like soccer players and the field/stadium graphics are fun. It arrived quickly and was easy to put together. The instructions were easy to follow and it only took about half an hour to put together by one person. You'll need to flip it over once you put it together, so that would require a second set of hands. Other than that, it can be built by one person. This isn't a high-end, arcade-grade table, but it's well worth the money as a casual table for kids & adults to use.
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my grandson, Collin. Not only does he and the whole family love Hathaway Playoff Soccer Table, but it arrived in plenty of time for his birthday. Always makes a Grandma happy when she selects the perfect present.
customer_reviews.author: Joan V. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how cool this fooseball table is and how affordable it is. It's practically the same size as a normal table is very durable and surprisingly well made. Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.author: jarell drake

customer_reviews.title: strong table
customer_reviews.text: awesome table. We've used it couple of times. Its sturdy for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rao

customer_reviews.title: fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for the family. I would rate it 5 stars but one of the parts were made wrong. Still playable and I am hoping the company sends a replacement piece. We are still able to play and we are having a good time with this.
customer_reviews.author: jellylou

customer_reviews.title: Shabby quality and assembly mightmare
customer_reviews.text: Assembly nightmare. Almost impossible to align playing field with grooves. Legs don't align with bolt holes.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids amd perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool table for kids....perfect size. The only thing we didn't like was taking 1.5 hours to build it. But totally worth it! Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dream Achiever

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas, and we both love it! It's very sturdy, and looks nice, despite league being spelled wrong on it. Pretty easy to put together, and it's really fun. Great product for the price, I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. I guess the truism stands
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to assemble. Very poor quality. I guess the truism stands ... "you get what you pay for".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping and decent table
customer_reviews.text: the table was shipped very fast since I have amazon prime. the assembly takes two people. it took about 1 hour to put the table together. the table is solid. all parts came complete. I got his table at a good price. lot of fun playing so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Still had to glue the rings so they wont unscrew themselves
customer_reviews.text: This table is great the only problem is that the rings that hold the bar of the players keep unscrewing themselves when you spin the players too fast
customer_reviews.author: Ofe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and does not take as long as the instructions say.
customer_reviews.author: James Lichtenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: looks great, durable, keeps the boys busy. My only complain is that once you put it together there is no way back and you can't fix it if you mad a mistake (like we did)
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great foosball table
customer_reviews.text: I thought this table was going to be very cheapy looking and feeling but after we put it together, it's perfect. Just what the little guy wanted. The kids enjoy playing with it and it's been wearing well so far. Very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, not too easy to ensemble but not hard that all!
customer_reviews.author: liesver rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, needs 2 persons though! Great quality for the price. We are very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great family magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this table - it was easy to assemble and good to play
customer_reviews.author: Leon S.

customer_reviews.title: Can not beat this price for this quality
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat this quality for the money. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a five year old and four year old......
customer_reviews.author: Mamie

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved them. Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these tables to give as christmas presents to different friends and famiy. Everyone loved them. Very nice table. Would recommend to anyone that is looking for good family fun.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Meh. First one came broken. Second one came ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. First one came broken. Second one came with a flaw as well, but decided to just keep it. Kid likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: six months in and all is well - read the posts with tips
customer_reviews.text: Great game people had good tips about how to put it together and make sure the men are the right way up. READ them before you start
customer_reviews.author: Bigman 1972

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the price! It is the perfect size for my 7 and 9 year old boys. I recommend ordering extra balls as they do sometimes go flying out of the table and are hard to find in our playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Smith

customer_reviews.title: When buying know the return policy. $30
customer_reviews.text: NEED I SAY MORE. And I am an Amazon Prime Member.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun with the family 😊
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and lots of fun for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Arana

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff !!
customer_reviews.text: Love it great value for money Already enjoying it with my 11 yr old!
customer_reviews.author: Prasenjit

customer_reviews.title: This table adds a fun element to my house
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the price. This table adds a fun element to my house. It may look substandard, but don't let looks deceive you. Its very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly sturdy and a good value for the money. Assembly is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Got this table for my daughter this Christmas (2014). Assembly was very straight forward and simple. My daughter, her dad and I have played countless number of times and it's holding up very nicely. No missing pieces or bent rods for us. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: La La

customer_reviews.title: we love it!
customer_reviews.text: my kids love this and it is a good product for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Linda MacLean

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! I would have prefer it to be more stable, though.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Z

customer_reviews.title: Kids 6-12 use it and they love it.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well made. Kids 6-12 use it and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: niblick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price. The directions for assembly weren't as well as could have been but once assembled it is sturdy for the whole family to have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this game. We play it several times a week. Very sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Spain

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: The poles broke in less than a year. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Foosball Table
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it. He's been playing the one at church for a year...and beating me. He's 3 and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Nils B. Ohman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and fun to play for novice players.
customer_reviews.author: Amol

product_meta.title: Hathaway Playoff 4’ Foosball Table, Soccer Game for Kids and Adults with Ergonomic Handles, Analog Scoring and Leg Levelers
product_meta.description: Exclusive eye-catching graphics and quality construction make this affordable Hathaway table play as well as tables costing much more! Guaranteed fun and excitement for the entire family. This quality built, action packed foosball table is constructed from CARB certified MDF. Soccer balls glide easily across the smooth, life like green grass playing surface. The table features dual manual slide scoring systems, goal boxes with built in automatic end ball return, 1/2 in. chrome plated tubular steel rods, ergonomic handles, and ABS molded durable players. This combination is great for ball control and table action. Colorful and life-like exterior action graphics add to the dynamics of the table. Take advantage of this quality table at this great price! 90-day Limited Warranty.
feature_bullets: DAZZLING DESIGN – Bring world-class excitement to your game room or office. The Playoff’s bright, colorful graphics depict a thrilling soccer stadium filled with rabid fans. Realistic, ABS-molded players add to the exciting, immersive experience

PERFECT FOR FAMILIES – Kids will love the fast-paced play and high-gloss graphics. Adults will love its compact size and durable construction. The Playoff’s ergonomic handles are great for all ages, and its analog counters keep scoring simple

SOLID AND SECURE – Quality, engineered wood construction guarantees long-lasting stability. Its sleek, steel rods provide smooth and stable play. And the integrated leg levelers are easy to adjust, ensuring an even playing field

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Your table comes with a 180-day manufacturer warranty. We promise that it will arrive damage-free with all necessary parts and accessories. Otherwise, we’ll send replacement parts or an entirely new table at no cost to you
DIMENSIONS - Playing surface: 40” L x 22.75” W; Table dimensions: 48.5” L x 24” W x 32” H
